goblet_sq_tempo.name: Tempo Goblet Squat
goblet_sq_tempo.instruction: 4s down, 1s hold at bottom. Focus on depth.

rdl_heavy.name: Romanian Deadlift
rdl_heavy.instruction: Hinge hips back. Feel the hamstring stretch.

bulgarian_ss.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
bulgarian_ss.instruction: Back foot on bench. Control the descent.

leg_press_sl.name: Single Leg Press
leg_press_sl.instruction: Focus on the 'pushing away' and slow return.

step_up.name: Weighted Step Up
step_up.instruction: Drive through the heel, control the way down.

calf_raise.name: Calf Raises
calf_raise.instruction: Full range of motion, pause at the top.
